titleStmt.title: The Earle of Strafford his ellegiack poem, as it was pen'd by his owne hand a little before his death.
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "State give me leave, and vexe my thoughts no more ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
